name: Fonts
body:
A collection of downloadable font files, categorized by type. [1]

## How to Use
This repository contains fonts for your computer, not your website (i.e. you can use them in Microsoft Word, Pages, etc.). Instructions:

#### Version 1: Download the whole enchilada, and install only some fonts

- Download a `.zip` of the repository (on site, or GitHub)
- Selectively install the fonts you like
- Delete the `.zip` from your Downloads folder when you're done (to save space)

#### Version 2: Selectively download from GitHub

- If you view a raw font file, *usually* it will try to download.
- Selectively view the raw files of each font file you want to download
- Install the fonts by clicking on them/opening them.

## Exhaustive Font List
Below is a list of all the fonts in the repository:

- Abel
- Alegreya
- Alegreya Sans
- Alegreya SC
- Alegreya Sans SC
- Anton
- Arimo
- Arvo
- Bangers
- Beacon
- Bebas Neue
- Bitters
- Bree Serif
- Cabin
- Candal
- Clemente
- Constantine
- Dosis
- Droid Sans
- Droid Serif
- Facet
- Fipps
- Fjalla One
- Freshman
- Goudy Bookletter 1911
- Hind
- Inconsolata
- Indie Flower
- Josefin Sans
- Lato
- Liberation Mono
- Liberation Sans
- Liberation Serif
- Liquid Crystal
- Lobster
- Molot
- Old London
- Olivetti Type 2
- Quicksans
- Riffic
- Snowstorm
- Tribal
- White Rabbit

---

[1] This could be interpreted as a pun, considering the two definitions of the word *type*.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
